activity_differential: customers browsing and queuing in a manga merchandise store
description: A series of frames inside a manga/anime merchandise store, showing multiple people browsing, queuing, and moving through the store. The camera is positioned at the entrance and remains mostly static, capturing the flow of customers as they interact with products and each other.
